title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not always work
description: When trying to close all saved files, the expected behavior is that the file should be closed without any changes being made. However, in some cases, this does not happen.
OB: When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, after creating a new file f1.txt, selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu does not close the file.
EB: The expected behavior is that selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu should close the file without any changes being made.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Use build 20020508 with the latest UI code. 2. Open any file and make changes. 3. Create a new file f1.txt. 4. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu. The file should not be closed without any changes being made.
